output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```


```{r}
clean_names(ucsb_grad)

ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity), position = "fill") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Year", 
       y = "Proportion of domestic graduate enrollment",
       title = "Yearly UCSB graduate student enrollment by ethnicity",
       subtitle = "(2008 - 2019)")
```

**Figure 1:** UCSB graduate student enrollment by ethnicity. Color varies by ethnicity as a proportion of total enrollment (UC Information Center).
